short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplify your task management with Task Wizard. Add, organize, and complete tasks effortlessly in your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to Task Wizard, your ultimate tool for seamless task management. Whether you're juggling personal to-dos or professional deadlines, Task Wizard is designed to help you stay organized and productive. Here's what Task Wizard offers:

Add Tasks Easily: Quickly jot down tasks as they come to mind.
Mark Tasks as Done/Undone: Easily toggle the status of your tasks.
Delete Tasks: Remove tasks that are no longer needed.
Select All/Unselect All: Manage multiple tasks at once with ease.
Delete Selected Tasks: Clean up your task list in one go.
Clear All Tasks: Start fresh with a single click.
Numbered Tasks: Keep track of your tasks with automatic numbering.
User-Friendly Interface: Enjoy a clean, colorful, and intuitive design.

Task Wizard is here to help you take control of your tasks and enhance your productivity.
